title: Afghanistan - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 4/27/21
itunes:title: Afghanistan - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 4/27/21
description:
George Noory and author Jack Carr explore his career as a former Navy SEAL, President Biden's proposal to remove US troops from Afghanistan twenty years after 9/11, the continuing threats from terrorists and Iran, as well as an upcoming TV series adapted from his novels starring Chris Pratt.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
